main.name: JM
main.bio: I am an entrepreneur with a passion for high-quality menswear, menswear education, and JavaScript Development. In the last ten years, I have dedicated myself to small business and local economic development. I work closely with other entrepreneurs, c-level executives, and senior leadership to create unique projects that bring brand awareness and generate revenue. Apart from being a full-time entrepreneur, I'm a husband and father to be living and working in San Antonio, Texas. I love music, menswear, business development, coffee, and a good cigar. When forced indoors, I follow whatever television shows my wife is watching, I am an aspiring product designer, and I spend my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the web + mobile development world. Lastly, I am optimistic and enjoy problem-solving at any level. I take pride in helping people find connections that add value to their aspirations, business, and lifestyle.

education.school: University of Texas at San Antonio

work.title: Senior Developer
work.description: As a Senior Developer, I work closely with the Design team to bring unique and creative programable solutions for businesses, high profile individuals, professional athletes, and more. I write clean and scalable code using JavaScript-based frameworks that work across all platforms and operating systems. We create unforgettable experiences for our clients and take pride in quality data-driven software that brings your brand to new heights.

work.title: Freelance Developer
work.description: As a freelance web and mobile developer, I work closely with small to large-sized advertising and marketing firms to bring client mock-ups to life. From conception to deployment, I cover the full lifecycle of an application to create a clean, functional, and scalable application. When I began learning to program, I realized that I have a competitive advantage in an e-commerce development role because of my experience on the other end of the spectrum in terms of operations, international vendor communication, and product development. My new knowledge is full-stack development has given me a lethal combination of skills to help my clients maximize their investments and generate revenue online.

work.title: Founder and Design Director
work.description: As design director, I ensure that all products and experiences are delivered on time, on budget, and to the highest quality standards. In addition to communicating SBJM's creative vision to the design team, and partners, I supervise the entire design process and all-important technical decisions that encompass the design and distribution process.

work.title: Founder and Master Stylist
work.description: As a private wardrobe liaison, I create custom looks that fit my client's personal and professional lifestyle. My business books consist of high-profile individuals, entrepreneurs, executives, doctors, attorneys, and real estate professionals. TRG is a membership-based service where a current active member must recommend applicants.

work.title: Director of Business Development
work.description: As a business development director, I also lead sales and client-relationship management, tracked new markets and emerging trends, recommends new products and services to the business center clients, proposed and developed new strategic partnerships, wrote proposals and plans, and guided long-term objectives to meet business needs and requirements.

testimonials.text: Perfection. JM's CRM solution for our business was game changer. It was worth the wait and expense.
I worked with JM a few years ago on a project and he was such a delight to work with. He is extremely knowledgeable in his trade and has a true passion for his work.
